text: Area code 780 is a telephone area code in the province of Alberta, Canada. It primarily serves the northern and central parts of the province, including the city of Edmonton. It was created on May 18, 1999 as a split from area code 403. It was overlaid by 587 in 2008, 825 in 2016, and 368 in 2022. 780
title: Area code 780
